Key Arguments: The proposed law threatens the foundation of a free and democratic society.
The government cannot be the ultimate arbiter of truth, as this is a form of misinformation itself.
The law is biased against common people who lack resources to defend themselves, while exempting government, academia, and corporate media.
The legislation undermines democratic principles by silencing dissenting voices from the general populace.
Notable Quotes: This law will be the effective end of a free and democratic society if implemented.
What ignorance or arrogance to think you are the arbiters of the ‘rightness’ of the speech of all the common populace.
Quite clearly, this law is designed to target the common person with the least resources to defend themselves.
